name: My Last 3 Brain Cells
description:
Spacebar progresses dialogue or activates selection in menu.

This game takes place while sliding on tubes in a nightmare version of the brain!  The Floor is lava!  There are spinning sawblades!  Also that green guy shoots fireballs.

WASD controls movement.  You can speed up, slow down, or fall through pipes.  Space allows jump or double jump.  Mouse controls aiming, and left click shoots.  Right click to turn on a deflector shield to send fireballs back at the boss!  Don't use it too much cause if it runs out you won't be able to use it at all until it recharges.

You can also play with a controller!  Left stick does movement, right stick aims, right trigger fires, right bumper deflects.  Jump with A or Left trigger.
